description: The post describes a scenario where the Windows Update process, particularly after the installation of the 5031224 and October update 5031356 on Windows 10 Pro, is leading to unexpected user experiences. Users are receiving conflicting notifications to restart during the update process, despite the system still downloading and installing updates. This delay in the welcome screen appears to affect login times, significantly increasing the expected duration after entering the PIN, indicating potential issues with system responsiveness or update management.
